column4: Question : Dose anyone know how to help me setup my ADSL Sagem 800 Modem?
please stop repeating the same question. If someone knows, (s)he will answer. You can try posting on the mailing list too.
i tried
who did..?
i meant the Ubuntu mailinglists
of course you may suggest, but Ubuntu will most likely stay on freenode
that server us better#
but ubuntu has quite strong binding with freenode
hello
sure, but not on the same partition...
the Ubuntu installer can do that for you or PQmagic, the windows installer can not
i think i found the problem with my ADSL modem
OMG!
hmm, have you determined already which module kicks out the ADSL..?
what should i do now
somehow one module loaded by hotplug screws up your adsl, you will need to find out which and add the name of that module to /etc/hotplug/blacklist
how will i find it out
no idea, really
in the terminal you type: lsmod | grep usb
Private Msg
I have that on ignore (I get unsollicited pm's from too many people), please ask in here
